DOC.brief_summary: this is a prospective randomized placebo-controlled double-blinded trial investigating the effect of plant extracts from Alpinia galanga and Punica granatum on human semen quality. The investigators hypothesize that these plant extracts will improve semen quality.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Plant Extracts on Semen Quality
DOC.criteria: Reduced semen quality Total count of motile sperm less than 1 million sperm/ejaculate or more than 200 million sperm/ejaculate
